Verses: 1 aabiraamum, Avan Manaiviyum, Avanukku Undaana Yaavum, Avanudane Loththum, Egipthai Vittu, Thenthisaiyil Vandhaargal.
2 aabiraam Mirugajeevangalum Velliyum Ponnumaana Aasthigalaiyudaiya Seemaanaayirundhaan.
3 avan Than Prayaanangalile Therkeyirundhu Beththel Mattum, Beththelukkum Aayeekkum Naduvaagath Thaan Munbu Koodaarampottadhum,
4 thaan Mudhalmudhal Oru Balipeedaththai Undaakkinadhumaana Sthalamattum Ponaan; Ange Aabiraam Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukondaan.
5 aabiraamudane Vandha Loththukkum Aadumaadugalum Koodaarangalum Irundhana.
6 avargal Orumiththuk Kudiyirukka Andha Boomi Avargalaith Thaangakkoodaadhirundhadhu; Avargaludaiya Aasthi Migudhiyaayirundhapadiyaal, Avargal Orumiththu Vaasampanna Edhuvillaamarpoyitru.
7 aabiraamudaiya Mandhaimeypparukkum Loththudaiya Mandhaimeypparukkum Vaakkuvaadham Undaayitru. Akkaalaththile Kaanaaniyarum Perisiyarum Aththesaththil Kudiyirundhaargal.
8 aabiraam Loththai Nokki: Enakkum Unakkum, En Meypparukkum Un Meypparukkum Vaakkuvaadham Vendaam; Naam Sagodharar.
9 indha Dhesamellaam Unakku Mun Irukkiradhu Allavaa? Nee Ennaivittup Pirindhupogalaam; Nee Idadhupuram Ponaal, Naan Valadhupuram Pogiren; Nee Valadhupuram Ponaal, Naan Idadhupuram Pogiren Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Loththu Than Kangalai Ereduththup Paarththu; Yordhaan Nadhikku Arugaana Samaboomi Muzhuvadhum Neervalam Porundhinadhaayirukkak Kandaan. Karththar Sodhomaiyum Komoraavaiyum Azhikkummunne, Sovaarukkup Pom Vazhimattum Adhu Karththarudaiya Thottaththaip Polavum Egipthu Dhesaththaippolavum Irundhadhu.
11 appozhudhu Loththu Yordhaanukku Arugaana Samaboomi Muzhuvadhaiyum Therindhukondu, Kizhakke Prayaanappattup Ponaan; Ippadi Avargal Oruvarai Oruvar Vittup Pirindhaargal.
12 aabiraam Kaanaan Dhesaththil Kudiyirundhaan; Loththu Andha Yordhaanukku Arugaana Samaboomiyilulla Pattanangalil Vaasampanni, Sodhomukku Nere Koodaaram Pottaan.
13 sodhomin Janangal Pollaadhavargalum Karththarukku Munbaaga Magaa Paavigalumaai Irundhaargal.
14 loththu Aabiraamaivittup Pirindhapinbu, Karththar Aabiraamai Nokki: Un Kangalai Ereduththu, Nee Irukkira Idaththilirundhu Vadakkeyum, Therkeyum, Kizhakkeyum, Merkeyum Nokkippaar.
15 nee Paarkkira Indha Boomi Muzhuvadhaiyum Naan Unakkum Un Sandhadhikkum Endraikkum Irukkumpadi Koduththu,
16 un Sandhadhiyai Boomiyin Thoolaippolap Perugappannuven; Oruvan Boomiyin Thoolai Ennakkoodumaanaal, Un Sandhadhiyum Ennappadum.
17 nee Ezhundhu Dhesaththin Neelamum Agalamum Emmatto, Ammattum Nadandhu Thiri; Unakku Adhaith Tharuven Endraar.
18 appozhudhu Aabiraam Koodaaraththaip Peyarththukkondupoi, Ebironilirukkum Mamreyin Samaboomiyil Serndhu Kudiyirundhu, Ange Karththarukku Oru Balipeedaththaik Kattinaan.
